nodes.text: The Botsini crew was a crew of individuals that operated at some point after the fall of the Galactic Empire. The crew was known for a strategy where the captain gave each member of the crew a specific job, withholding the full details of their plans, so that if a mistake was made it would be clear who was at fault. The Batuuan resident Julen Rakab thought that the strategy could only work if there were backup plans.
The Botsini crew was first mentioned in the 2019 novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova.
